idea: We operate under the brand name of Food Darzee. Food Darzee is a health and nutrition company that provides personalized meals on a subscription basis. Each customer that comes on board is assigned a personal nutritionist who plans the meals and then the food is delivered as per the plan. We operational and Mumbai, Delhi NCR and Pune.
name: 3CAD HOSPITALITY LIMITED LIABILITY PARTNERSHIP

idea: We are a Startup in the Food Vertical in an interesting and niche category of Food Delivery in Long Distance running Trains. This shall be in collaboration with IRCTC . We plan to operate on All the major Trunk Routes of the Indian Rail Network.
name: U GAGAR VENTURES PRIVATE LIMITED
